ChunkLightCache Class Reference

This class caches all the lights in a chunk in an easy-to-use light container. More...

Static Public Member Functions

static void touch (Chunk &chunk)
 This static function makes sure that a chunk light cache exists in the chunk that is about to be loaded, since we want to exist in every chunk so that their lighting is right.

Static Public Attributes

static const int MAX_LIGHT_SEEP_DEPTH = 2
static Instance< ChunkLightCache > instance
 Static instance accessor initialiser.

Detailed Description

This class caches all the lights in a chunk in an easy-to-use light container.

Member Function Documentation

void ChunkLightCache::bind ( bool  isUnbind  )  [virtual]

Bind method.

We flag our cache as dirty, because we have to pick up lights from adjoining chunks

void ChunkLightCache::draw (  )  [virtual]

Draw method.

We refresh ourselves if necessary, and then load ourselves into the Moo render context.

void ChunkLightCache::touch ( Chunk &  chunk  )  [static]

This static function makes sure that a chunk light cache exists in the chunk that is about to be loaded, since we want to exist in every chunk so that their lighting is right.
